'''Emily Austin''' is an American artist who paints scenes from Tolkien’s stories.

She made cover art for the books ''The Inklings and King Arthur'' by [[Sørina Higgins]] and ''Why We Love Middle-earth'' by [[Shawn Marchese]] and [[Alan Sisto]] (founders of [[The Prancing Pony Podcast]]).

Her illustrations "The Yellow Door" and "The Vale of Rivendell" were featured in [[Tolkien Calendar 2023]].
